sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.WorkspaceUIActionsProvider</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Provides a filter to which UI Actions are available to be selected in a UI Action Group.</description>
        <name>WorkspaceUIActionsProvider</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var WorkspaceUIActionsProvider = Class.create();
WorkspaceUIActionsProvider.prototype = {
	getActions: function(current) {
		var stringQueryPostfix = '^active=true^form_button_v2=true^ORform_menu_button_v2=true';
		var tableName = String(current.ui_action_layout.table || '');
		if (tableName === '')
			return 'table=global' + stringQueryPostfix;

		var tables = GlideDBObjectManager.getTables(tableName).toArray().concat();
		tables.push('global');
		return 'tableIN' + tables + stringQueryPostfix;
	},
	type: 'WorkspaceUIActionsProvider'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-01-13 20:58:07</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1494b902c7120010ac43625788c260cf</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>WorkspaceUIActionsProvider</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Agent Workspace - Form" source="com.snc.agent_workspace.form">48054dc36de620100acb70b35343307f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1494b902c7120010ac43625788c260cf</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>andrew.kincaid</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-01-16 17:00:23</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>543</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
